00075 // Describes the pixel format of of a bitmap style surface for conversion purposes
00076 enum PixelFormat
00077 {
00078         PIXELFORMAT_RGB_16_565,
00079         PIXELFORMAT_RGB_16_555,
00080         PIXELFORMAT_RGB_32,
00081         PIXELFORMAT_16,         // Non-optimal - (non RGB formats)
00082         PIXELFORMAT_32,         // i.e. BGR...
00083         PIXELFORMAT_UNKNOWN
00084 };

00087 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 // Name: class CSurface
00089 // Desc: Class to handle aspects of a DirectDrawSurface.
00090 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00091 class CSurface
00092 {
00093     LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE7        m_pdds;
00094     BOOL                                        m_bColorKeyed;
00095         DDCOLORKEY                              m_ddck; // #1763 - record color key for later use in creating textures (MLM)
00096         
00097 public:
00098     DDSURFACEDESC2                      m_ddsd;
00099 
00100     LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE7        GetDDrawSurface() const { return m_pdds; }
00101     BOOL                                        IsColorKeyed() const { return m_bColorKeyed; }
00102         void                                    ClearColorKey(){ m_bColorKeyed = false; };
00103         DDCOLORKEY                              GetColorKey() const { return m_ddck; }          // #1763 - record color key for later use in creating textures (MLM)
00104         void                                    Invalidate();
00105 
00106         HRESULT                                 Lock(DDSURFACEDESC2* pddsd) const;
00107         HRESULT                                 Lock(LPRECT rect, DDSURFACEDESC2* pddsd) const;
00108         HRESULT                                 Unlock() const;
00109         HRESULT                                 IsLost() const;
00110         HRESULT                                 Restore();
00111         HRESULT                                 GetDC(HDC* hdc);
00112         HRESULT                                 ReleaseDC(HDC hdc);
00113

00115     HRESULT DrawText( HFONT hFont, const TCHAR* strText, DWORD dwOriginX, DWORD dwOriginY,
00116                               COLORREF crBackground, COLORREF crForeground, COLORREF crShadow, const CPoint& shadowOffset );

00118

00120

00123         HRESULT Line(const CPoint &p1, const CPoint &p2, DWORD color, const int penWidth = 1);

00128    static       HRESULT GetBitMaskInfo( DWORD dwBitMask, DWORD* pdwShift, DWORD* pdwBits );
00129         const int       GetWidth() const { return m_ddsd.dwWidth; };
00130         const int       GetHeight() const { return m_ddsd.dwHeight; };
00131         const CRect     GetRect() const { return CRect(0,0,m_ddsd.dwWidth-1,m_ddsd.dwHeight-1); }

00142 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00143 // Name: class CDisplay
00144 // Desc: Class to handle all DDraw aspects of a display, including creation of
00145 //       front and back buffers, creating offscreen surfaces and palettes,
00146 //       and blitting surface and displaying bitmaps.
00147 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00148 
00149 //enum ENGINELIB SurfaceRAM             // Moved to BuildTypeGlobals.h (JES 2-7-03)
00150 //{
00151 //      SYSTEM_RAM,
00152 //      VIDEO_RAM
00153 //};
00154 
00155 class CDisplay
00156 {
00157         friend class CurrentSurfaceRAM;
00158 
00159 protected:
00160     LPDIRECTDRAW7       m_pDD;
00161

00163     LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE7 m_pddsBackBuffer;

00168     BOOL                m_bWindowed;
00169         bool                waitForRetrace;

00171         unsigned long           m_lUsedVRAM;
00172         unsigned long           m_lPrevUsedVRAM;
00173         PixelFormat                     m_pixelFormat;
00174 
00175 public: 
00176         // ET - 05/17/01 - Bug #1628
00177         // Keep track of # of modals up, as we will flip to GDI
00178         // during modals.
00179         static int                      m_iNumModals;
00180         static bool                     m_bFlipping;
00181         
00182 public:
00183     CDisplay();
00184     ~CDisplay();
00185 
00186         shared_ptr<CSurface> m_surface;
00187         //CSurface* m_extraSurface;
00188 
00189     // Access functions
00190     HWND                 GetHWnd()           { return m_hWnd; }
00191     LPDIRECTDRAW7        GetDirectDraw()     { return m_pDD; }
00192     LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE7 GetFrontBuffer()    { return m_pddsFrontBuffer; }
00193     LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE7 GetBackBuffer()     { return m_pddsBackBuffer; }
00194         
00195     // Status functions
00196         SurfaceRAM GetFavoredSurfaceRAM()                { return (m_favorVRAM) ? VIDEO_RAM : SYSTEM_RAM; }
00197         
00198         static bool IsFlipping() { return m_bFlipping; }
00199         static void DisableFlipping(bool bDisable)       { m_bFlipping = bDisable; }
00200 
00201     // Creation/destruction methods
00202     HRESULT CreateFullScreenDisplay( HWND hWnd, DWORD dwWidth, DWORD dwHeight,
00203                                              DWORD dwBPP );

00208

00210         HRESULT SetClipperWindow( HWND hwnd );

00214         // Flipping
00215         HRESULT FlipToGDISurface(bool force = true);
00216

00219                                    DWORD dwHeight, DWORD dwCaps=0 );

00222

00224     HRESULT Clear( DWORD dwColor = 0L );

00226     
00227         // These two functions do NOT perform clipping
00228         HRESULT Blt( DWORD x, DWORD y, LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE7 pdds, RECT* prc=NULL, DWORD dwFlags=0 );
00229     HRESULT Blt( DWORD x, DWORD y, CSurface* pSurface, RECT* prc = NULL, DWORD dwFlags=0 );
